```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(openintro)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggbeeswarm)
library(modelr)
library(broom)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

Os dados que usaremos estão detalhados nessa página do [OpenIntro](https://www.openintro.org/data/index.php?data=evals).

```{r}
profs = read_csv("https://www.openintro.org/stat/data/evals.csv") %>% 
    select(score, age, gender, bty_avg, pic_outfit, pic_color)
glimpse(profs)
```


```{r}
profs %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = age, y = score)) + 
    geom_count()

profs %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = bty_avg, y = score)) + 
    geom_count()

profs %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = pic_outfit, y = score)) + 
    geom_count()

profs %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = pic_color, y = score)) + 
    geom_count()
```
